subject: Server Side EJB application testing
msgSnippet: I need to test a server side EJB application with JUnit.  How would I accomplish this.  Our application follows a J2EE, session façade, architecture with
messageBody:
I need to test a server side EJB application with JUnit. How would I
accomplish this. Our application follows a J2EE, session façade,
architecture with EJB's that reflect database table rows. Other classes in
the application support the functionality of the application. My particular
problem is that I have to ensure that the errors being thrown by my
applications are logical. Are there tests I can write to accomplish this?
Examples if any are appreciated. Thanks in advance for your input.

Gowri Puvanachandran
Programmer Analyst
